question.text: Which of the following processes involves smelting?

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mover accent="false"><mo>→</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mover><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mover accent="false"><mo>→</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mover><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math>

<math><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mover accent="false"><mo>→</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mover><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>.</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mover accent="false"><mo>→</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi></mrow></mover><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></math>

solution.text:
Smelting involves reduction with carbon so here it is case of smelting.
Fe2O3+3C→Heat2Fe+3CO
Reactions given in options A and D involve calcination while that of in option C involves roasting.
